<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Song of Marching](/Feats.aspx?ID=1643) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You learn the [_song of marching_](/Spells.aspx?ID=731) composition cantrip, which enables you and your allies to cross vast distances without strain.
name: Song of Marching
